website_summaries.verdict: If you want a long-lasting sunscreen that's recommended by professionals, this formula provides outstanding protection in a creamy formula that feels good on the skin.
pros: Offers excellent protection from the sun, which includes 60 SPF and wear for up to 80 minutes in the water
Doesn't contain parabens or fragrance, and has a smooth, fast absorbing consistency
cons: Tends to run if you sweat a lot, and stings if it gets in your eyes

website_summaries.verdict: This dermatologist recommended sunscreen offers SPF 60 to protect your body and face.
pros: Formulated with antioxidants to help protect skin from UV rays
Leaves skin feeling hydrated and smooth
cons: A pricey option compared to other brands

customer_reviews.title: Oxybenzone? No thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this not realizing that it contains oxybenzone which is highly toxic not only to coral reefs but is absorbed through the skin and linked to endocrine disruption as well as cancer. Ingredients such as these have not been properly evaluated by the FDA and therefore I sent this product directly back to Amazon. If it’s destroying reefs, what do you think it’s doing to your internal organs? EWG gives the product a 7, which isn’t good. That’s well into the harmful zone. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it in your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was highly recommended by Consumer Reports. The only thing I didn't like about it is that it is very thin (I guess that's why they call it "milk") and with the very least perspiration it got in my eyes and it stings like crazy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bluejeans

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the heavy price tag
customer_reviews.text: Although this sunblock protected my skin from sunburn, the texture was nothing like its name implies. It left my skin feeling incredibly greasy and if I sweat the smallest amount I was covered in white liquidy film. Very disappointed for the price will go back to coppertone sport for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin rashes
customer_reviews.text: This product cause I have skin rashes. Used it less than 5 times and my skin turns out really bad. This is the first time I’m using sunscreen so idk if any of the ingredients in that cause the allergy. Please make sure you want to try a sample/research it carefully before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Twee

customer_reviews.title: good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: good sunscreen recommended by my dermatologist. Not sure its any better than any other sunscreen I've used. Wouldn't buy again. Not for use on face - oily. make sure you order the serum for your face if you break out at all (I'm in my 50s and this made me break out)
customer_reviews.author: S. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Work well, feels nice
customer_reviews.text: This works well for Sun protection, goes on easily and smoothly, and feels nice on the skin, for body anyway. My face didn't want to absorb it, leaving it really shiny and gross feeling, with noticeable residue which needed addressed with blotting and powder. It made me really regret forgetting to pack my Elta facial sunscreen, but for a body sunscreen, this will be my top choice going forward. Note: I have not used it while swimming, and only for moderate activity not heavy exercise, so I can't speak to its effectiveness in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT oxybenzone free
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this sunscreen because the description says oxybenzone free, and the product picture of the label does not contain oxybenzone. The ingredients list on both the box and tube I received include oxybenzone. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: excellent protection, no residue
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection. I have very fair sensitive skin and just spent 8 days on a boat, usually only applying this once each morning on face and body, and have absolutely no sunburn, barely even a tan. I was super impressed with how long it protected my skin without diligent application throughout the rest of the day. I use high end cosmetics and skin care products, including other very expensive sunscreens, and found this sunscreen to be the most effective with no goopy, chalky, or greasy residue. I also appreciate that it has no strong fragrance or chemical odor, unlike most other sunscreens that I've tried. I've found a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality at a high cost
customer_reviews.text: The product sounds amazing but it’s not what I expected at all. It has a thick greasy feeling when you rub it in, and it always sweats off. The worst is when I squeeze it out of the bottle it’s chunky! It almost looks like cottage cheese, which is not at all what I would have expected for something this pricey. I’ve had much better experience with the Blue Lizard stuff... and it’s much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to try this product because I haven't had the best of luck with face sunscreens other than at the beach. I have very fair skin, but all other sunscreens made me breakout. I use this sunscreen everyday and have not broken out at all. I do not even have to use a moisturizer when I wear this, which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I love it Rated best by Consumer Reports and my dermatologist sells it in his office. Highly recommend this product. .
customer_reviews.author: gawilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skincare starts with this!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, my favorite sunscreen. I have been using this brand daily for years with no issues whatsoever. I use this and their face primer and never get burned. No scent, goes on light and quick with no stickiness. Another good thing is because it's so light, it doesn't settle on your skin. No white streaks in any creases! Everyone should be using sunscreen every day, and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: BiddyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Comfort, excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says it will do -- provide excellent protection without leaving you with an oily or pasty feeling. It is not fully invisible and you know you are wearing it, but it is far and away better feeling than an y other product I've tried, from oils to lotions to sticks.
customer_reviews.author: WHL Dad

customer_reviews.title: The Proof is in the Pudding
customer_reviews.text: I applied this first thing in the morning, then proceeded to work outside, all day (about 6 hours), in the blazing heat and bright NC sun. Absolutely no shade, lots of sweat, and wiping at my face throughout the day. Never reapplied it once. And guess what? It kept my very fair, fragile skin protected. Not a trace of sun exposure was visible on my face that evening or the next day. Also, my skin is very sensitive and prone to breaking out, but I had no issues whatsoever. This stuff is the real deal, folks!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessD

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Sunblocker
customer_reviews.text: This is very good sunscreen. Bought for a trip to the Caribbean. It performed well and was a really good sunblocker in fact the best I have ever used. Contains UV-A and UV-B protection. It's is a bit milky (chalky) on your skin at first but blends in after 10 full minutes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: High quality sunscreen for face and body
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years - recommended by my aesthetician and dermatologist. I use it on my face, hands and neck. Great for dry skin - I don't use a moisturizer with this product. Highly recommend this and other La Roche=Posay skin products , I've used many other of this company's products. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunscreen. Sinks into my skin well and it’s not too greasy. It’s thick enough to be used on its own as a moisturizer/ sunscreen in the summer months and layers well with other moisturizers/ make up. It doesn’t ball up and it doesn’t leave a white cast. It’s also fragrance free and doesn’t have the typical sunscreen scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I consider La Roche-Posay to be a high-quality, "nicer" skincare brand, so I was surprised that this sunscreen seemed so average. It's a fine sunscreen, but you could buy one with a similar texture and performance for less money. I definitely wouldn't describe it as a sunscreen "milk," which made me think it'd be more sheer and liquid-y. However, it feels just as thick as any drugstore brand of sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: No wonder it was rated as #1 by the consumer product magazine.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is very light skinned, and we used this product in the high mountain of Colorado, and never received a sunburn. We are very, very pleased with the results of this product. We found out about this product through one of the consumer magazines rating it as the top sunscreen product out on the market. It’s not greasy or leaves any residue on your clothing. This will be the only product that we use from this point on.
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Rashes!
customer_reviews.text: Gave my face rashes as you see in the pic. I was really hoping it would work because i dont know why i can never find a sunscreen that works for my skin. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not the French Version
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product is made for US customers, so the active ingredients are oily and sticky like Neutrogena's brand sun cream. If I were you, I'd buy a Korean brand sunscreen or try to get the imported version of this. Better for the body than the face.
customer_reviews.author: Dxyan

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: It is 100% chemical. If you have a combo or non-chemical; this is not for you. I personally will like a combination of both. I'm not sure I'll buy this again because the price is high and there are a lot of sunblocks out there for less and with equal quality.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Picture Size shown 5OZ is NOT as advertised.  3 OZ tube
customer_reviews.text: They are not clear this is a 3 FL OZ tube, you must scroll down and find the detail below alot of dirstracting nonsense. The picture is clearly marked as 5OZ. I thought the price was low for 5OZ and this 3 OZ tube is a good travel size. I will not retrun because I needed a travel size but becuase of their deceitful practice, I would not buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Not meant for sweaty, or anything wet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fall/winter sunblock. And it is best for face and neck, not only due to the price, but because it is superior protection, and your face and neck will have little to no contact with other stuff that could rub it off.. This is a top notch sunblock I been wearing off and on for years. But I still prefer the Japanese sunblocks, as they are almost like nothing is there, and has superior UVA protection like this, but stronger in sweat /humid weather than this. Overall 5/5 because this is great all around. And you should cherish having a bottle of possible the best or one of the best UVA blocking chemicals known to man.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Report 100 rating is well deserved
customer_reviews.text: I used as directed on trips to the Caribbean and the Holy Land. Not a single burn and only mild redness on my shoulders. (Obviously operator error) This in comparison to my travel companions who either used different sunscreen or balked at using any at all; they suffered burns of various severity. It was easy to apply and didn't feel sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth without being greasy. Not heavy feeling. Doesn’t smell. What I dislike about it is that it still creates blemishes. I have yet to find a sunscreen that doesn’t break me out. I’ll use it on all my other body parts, but not on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I recently decided to start wearing sunscreen daily, and started looking for one to use. This was the first purchase i made and I am glad it was this product. I use this every morning and let it soak in for 10-15 min before applying any other makeup. Most of the time I use a foundation powder or translucent setting powder over it so it stays all day. I never feel greasy after it soaks in and my skin looks amazing! Havent used through the summer yet, so I will be interested to see if it looks oily in the summer or not. The only complaint I have is that the applicator tip gets messy in the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle wisdo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Great protectant
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. Great protection in the Florida sun. Rubs in quickly and isn’t greasy. My whole family used it on face and body with no issues at Busch Gardens and other amusement parks. My fair headed 20 month old grandson didn’t catch a burn and that was so important to me!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and easily and well protects my skin better than any other sunscreen. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Cee

customer_reviews.title: Not for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I applied this sunscreen milk before going into a swimming pool. I avoided applying around my eyes but it didn't matter. While in the water, the sunscreen got into my eyes (probably from my forehead and eyebrows) and it was bad. My eyes were burning so bad that I had to get out of the water and wash my face with facial soap twice and put artificial tear multiple times. It was like dicing 3 onions all together. I had other incidents of having other sunblocks getting into my eyes but this was the worst ever. I'll just apply it to my neck and cheeks until it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed and would not recommend this product to anyone with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product on September 14th and it is not even a week and my skin is red and burned on all the spots I applied the cream. I am extremely disappointed and would not recommend this product to anyone with a sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: ArgZad

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My doc recommended this. I have sensitive skin and live in AZ. This product is amazing, not greasey, and stays for a long time. I would recommend this for people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leaves white cast
customer_reviews.text: this is a purely chemical sunscreen so why does it leave a white cast as if it were a mineral spf? the only pro about chemical sunscreens are that they are invisible on the skin, so this is white without the stability and gentleness of mineral spf. pass
customer_reviews.author: Essentialist

customer_reviews.title: Good feel but got rashy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product on recommendation of dematologist youtuber I trust. My skin is very fair and dry. I like the formulation, wasn't turned off by the smell. It absorbed easily and completely. Unfortunately I noticed after only a day of use itchiness, stinging and redness to my face and neck, some areas like a light sunburn. The itching was the worst. Nothing else had changed, so I won't be using this product.
customer_reviews.author: W H

customer_reviews.title: Top rated by Consumer Reports for UVA/UVB protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen after reading about it in Consumer Reports. It received a perfect score. We have historically used mineral-based sunscreens in our house, as I'm wary of oxybenzone and avobenzone, however Consumer Reports found that not a single mineral-based sunscreen performed as advertised in terms of UVA/UVB protection. I would rather take the chemical risk (and reef damage risk) than know I'm not getting good protection from the sun. It's not too greasy and doesn't have an offensive smell. Is it like putting on nothing at all? No. But it's tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: PLE sufferer
customer_reviews.text: Suffering from PLE for 10 years. Brought this bad boy to Greece for 2 weeks. I finally got some color. I was adamant about reapplying INSTEAD of coming back paler than when i left. Smooth, nonstick finish. I still took precautions, as always, to avoid the sun but when it was unavoidable i did not have a breakout. Maybe 1 bump... I’ll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vergidis

customer_reviews.title: Tested sunscreen is effective buy its velvety finish might not be so desireable
customer_reviews.text: Product has been tested by consumer reports and their claim spf 50 was tested and proven hence my purchase. I honestly have not gotten sunburned while on retin A (at night) while using this which has happened to me 2 times in the past using more expensive sunscreens which prompted me to do my research on sunscreen. The only thing I do not like about it is its velvety finish but for outdoor time without makeup it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Therese J.

customer_reviews.title: Suncreen is great and works very well
customer_reviews.text: I moved to Florida and have been getting "sun spots" on my face. Never had this in my life! Most facial moisturizers do not contain a good SPF. Using traditional sun-block that is for the body on my face every day is just YUK! This works very well. I also use it as my moisturizer because I don't seem to need more. I also use a serum at night that I got here on Amazon called Serum 21, I believe. Togther this works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face, skin peeling all over
customer_reviews.text: I usually use sunscreen with titanium or zinc oxide, but this one came with so many recommendations that I figured I'd try it. It burned going on, but that subsided pretty quickly. My mistake. End result: I ended up with red splotches everywhere I'd applied it. The splotches on my face and neck ended up as dry patches, peeling and flaking, as if I'd seriously burned. Product is in the trash. The first package I got, btw, had an open box and on safety seal, I returned that. The second, there was also no safety seal but the box was at least closed and didn't look to have been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Belhadjali

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sunscreen because of the high UBV/UBA protection and I must agree that so far it has been a great product. It is really thick and moisturizing and leaves the skin smooth and soft even. It has no particular scent other than the common sunblock smell-- which is good, especially for those w/sensitivities. The only minus about purchasing the product is that if not rubbed in thoroughly, it can leave a white film of product on your face or body; so, make sure before you walk out, you check to make sure you're not going to be walking around w this film of sunblock. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: gladys avila

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Used this sunscreen on a trip to the Dominican and it worked great! I also chose it because I had just read an article that said out of all the sunscreens tested that this one actually provided the spf coverage it said. That was a huge factor in my decision. I have also since tried the water-lotion version of this sunscreen and prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: not safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for three of our family, but it burned my daughter's skin. A bad reaction which at first we thought was sunburn, but turned out to be caused by the sunscreen itself. This is very bad for sunscreen that advertises itself as "safe for sensitive skin".
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaFamily

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this to me and said it is the kind all the doctors use in his office. He is a runner (as am I) and said this works the best when you are sweating. I agree and it'll be the only kind I use from now on. Soaks in well and doesn't sting my eyes when I use it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best sunscreen I have ever used! I have sensitive skin, can get break outs from sunscreen, and have very fair skin that needs protection in prolonged sun. This sunscreen is amazing, goes on light and smooth, protects well (some days I just needed the thinnest or reapplications to be covered for the second half of the day at the beach. My skin never felt greasy, it didn’t get a single break out, and never came close to being burnt. I would recommend this to anyone. I know it is pricey, but it does what it claims it will and feels good on, so I think it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Having extremely fair and sensitive skin, breaking out in rashes after relatively short sun exposures and living with a pool in sunny GA has me constantly on the lookout for effective and easy to use sunscreen. I managed to buy 3 tubes of this on special, and couldn’t be happier. It spreads easily, absorbs quickly and has no real smell. I did have to reapply after a little more than an hour, but it took just a quick sec because it absorbs so quickly. I had no reaction to it and didn’t burn. Will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: A Snelling

customer_reviews.title: Males beware
customer_reviews.text: This product provides very good sun protection according to Consumer Reports. It absorb quickly on hairless parts of your body. I am a male with hair on legs and arms. I noticed white reside left on skin in these areas even though I gave it a pretty good rub in. This was not a big concern for me as I was more interested in good sun protection. I think the hairier you are the more difficult it would be to get this product to totally "melt in".
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sunscreen Brand for 6 Years!
customer_reviews.text: Still my hands-down favorite sunscreen. Silky and dry to the touch, wears like iron. I have 50+ fair and sensitive skin, so SPF is really important for me. I have been using this brand for 6 years or more, and nothing competes.
customer_reviews.author: Macyanddan

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much for this to work as I usually use the moisturizer SPF 15 and wanted more protection but this after a while left my face covered in white flakes no matter how much I rubbed it in. Dusappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Juarez

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen I've used
customer_reviews.text: Most of my lifetime, consumer sunscreen protection has been a loosely regulated field full of bad products. The FDA stepped in and now sunscreen has to actually protect you while also not harming you. It sounds dumb, but we used to let people smoke on airplanes, it took someone to say the obvious "I don't think those curtains are protecting us from the smoking section". Same deal with sunscreen. This is the stuff Consumer Reports recommends, they were right.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dow

customer_reviews.title: Will order again and again
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen EVER! My three kids and myself all burn so easily. We bought this in anticipation of an upcoming vacation. It’s not greasy, stays on, and we didn’t even burn a little in July in Florida!!! This is the only sunscreen I have ever used that fully protected me. I usually end up burnt with blisters - even while using sunscreen. With this, I didn’t even get pink!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Berry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on recommendation from my dermatologist. My daughter has ultra-sensitive skin and this product did not give her skin any reaction. I use it daily as a facial moisturizer, because I no longer allow the mean old cancer-causing sun to touch my skin.
customer_reviews.author: dsf

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Other sunscreens, even those marketed for sensitive skin started giving me a rash when I’d use them. Someone saw my rash on vacation and recommended this sunscreen. I waited a month because of the cost but then I was planning to go river rafting in CO/UT and I really needed sunscreen (I have very pale skin) so I bought this stuff and I’m so glad I did. I was the only one who didn’t get a burn and happily no rash either :).
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Promising product that failed
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectation but ended up disappointed. Doesn't absorb well, run in the eyes if used for face, and doesn't seem to block the sun well enough.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it get hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for multiple reasons. The first that I wanted a daily sun block that didn't make me shiny. I just had surgery for melanoma and wanted a daily protection. I used it in FL and it was not great. After the bottle got hot, the cream had a bunch of lumps in it. It also did not soak in to my skin, it just left me sticky. I did return the product and am still looking for a daily sun block.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen I’ve used!
customer_reviews.text: Several in our family are very fair-skinned. I bought this because it ranks highest for sun protection in Consumer Reports. We just spent two weeks at the ocean, (after a long Midwest winter. We were white as could be, and not one of us got burned. It’s not greasy and absorbs into the skin. Didn’t seem to wash off in the ocean. I highly recommend this sunscreen, however it is very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite costly, but it really provides the best protection I have ever had. It is easy to apply, and not greasy. I think it is worth the price, and I recommend it if you are serious about sun protection. Also. a little goes a long way with this product, you do not need to slather it on as with other sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: karen makeba

customer_reviews.title: For the first time ever, I did not get sunburned!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a week in Curacao and this fair skinned Midwestern girl did not burn! This sunscreen is amazing. It goes on smooth as silk and soaks in quickly. I was in and out of the sea, hiking and working up a sweat for an entire week and this sunscreen held up. I have tried everything and after a few skin cancer scares, I thought my only choices were mineral sun screen which makes you look like a clown and is impossible to remove or to stay in the shade. Thanks to this product I can enjoy the feel of the sun on my skin again. It's expensive, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Piontek

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It is light and effective. I have found other "face" sunscreens seem to sit on my face, leave a residue and seem to be a bit drying. The Athelios absorbs quickly, is moisturizing, and leaves no residue. This is my go-to sunscreen. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really does *melt* into skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! It really does *melt* into my skin and leaves it dewy and free of that whitish cast that I usually get with face sunscreens. It actually makes for a decent primer. I usually get the tinted fluid sunscreen but they were out of it, so I went with this and a bit of Glossier Skin Tint. Excellent alternative! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Huffman

customer_reviews.title: no white cast, no dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. This sunscreen is definitely worth the high price tag because not only is it moisturizing, but it also melts into the skin quite easily without leaving an annoying white cast. It's good on both body and the face.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my face break out in terrible pimples. BEWARE OF THIS SUNSCREEN. BAD CHEMICAL INGREDIENTS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on my doctor's recommendation. I use it daily on my face especially under my moisurizer, primer and makeup. I usually use it all over as well. I haven't had any issue with it. I rub it in my hands before applying to warm it. The product absorbs well and leaves no residue. I've noticed that my facial skin looks better and my dark spots are fading slightly. I will continue to use this forever. The cost is minimal compared to having skin cancer.
customer_reviews.author: LAWNC

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen made me break out in painful hives and swelling that lasted for 2 days. I have never experienced anything like this with any other skincare product. Ironically, the Cicaplast Baume I purchased at the same time is helping to soothe the irritation caused by this sunscreen. So I guess this is a recommendation for Cicaplast Baume.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I adore this and it lives up to its reputation. Yes it is expensive but it is completely worth it. It does not clog pores. It is not sticky or pasty. Very easy to apply. It feels like a good moisturizer. It does not have a scent. Only a mild "product" smell but it fades very quickly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bella

customer_reviews.title: Only Sunscreen I Will Use!
customer_reviews.text: Many times in the past I have noticed that although my family and I are in the sun at the same time and place I have been burnt using other brands, but my kids didn’t burn while wearing La Roche-Posay. I trust This sunscreen to be consistently good and keep us from burning. I won’t buy any other sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: M Schroer

customer_reviews.title: After 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I like its milky texture and it does moisturize my skin . There is however no way to know if it is a new or returned product because it comes without a seal ( a customer who used it for many years says that the product never had one) and with the original box opened and undone , like many customers have commented. Such sloppiness for a pricey product !
customer_reviews.author: Gypsychloe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, non-greasy, and minimal scent. I am a blonde with extremely fair skin, and this did not cause me to breakout, nor did it sting after I started to sweat. It’s a really nice smooth product, that dries down to an ungreasy finish. Feels more like skincare than sun protection. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I researched this product and found it contains less of the harsh chemicals or your skin. Protects from the sun really well. I gave as a gift to my daughter s fiancé, who s skin is very light, and he say he doesn't burn at all. A bit hard to spread and make it blend into skin but once it does, it really protects
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Simply an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have found it difficult to find a sunscreen that is pleasant on my skin and does the job of protection that I buy it for. I wish the product was less expensive, but it does what I need without bothering my skin, so I will keep purchasing it. It is a very well made sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been the best sun protection for my face that I've found. It rubs in nicely, makes my skin feel very smooth, and most of all, no burning, itching or anything with my very sensitive face. Great product. This is the third tube I have received and I really like this product. I know I'll be ordering lots more.
customer_reviews.author: diane c-c

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend in - leaves marks on clothes & body
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand but something is wrong with this product : - does not blend in completely, - leaves white marks on your body - ruined my clothes (left my white clothes yellow, even after washing / black swimsuit has white marks too ) - left marks on the leather of my car too I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WMT

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with weak and delicate and sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am Eastern European with BLOND hair and BLUE eyes. We are known to be more susceptible to skin cancer. It's actually a fact. In any case, for my fair and delicate and sensitive skin, this sunscreen is the best thing that ever happened to me. Thank you guys and will order A LOT more in the next season!!
customer_reviews.author: Cool Hand Luke

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money -- product "flakes"
customer_reviews.text: There's something wrong with this product: it "flakes" the way a sweater might "pill" -- no matter what sort of serum or moisturizer I wear under it, little white pieces flake off. The other day, a stranger in the street street stopped to ask if there's something the matter with my skin! I've had other products by this company before, with good results. But this sunblock is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dora K

customer_reviews.title: Expiration way too soon
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date of this product is September. Sun screen usually should have an expiration date of like 2 years, not just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Schweizer

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this for my daily walk and I haven't gotten a sun burn yet. It does leave me really oily though. I do really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Okay spf
customer_reviews.text: This spf was not bad but also was not my favorite. Upon first application it burned my eyes and made them water even though i didn’t get any product inside my eyes. However after the second time it no longer burned so I’m not sure if this was just my skin getting used to the product. I also find that it pills on certain areas of my face. Other than that I like that it does not leave my face feeling greasy and as an oily skinned person, my face does not get oily throughout the day. It did not break me out which is also a plus. Overall it’s okay.
customer_reviews.author: Gizelle Avitia

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see it mentioned anywhere else, so maybe I got a weird batch, but to me this smelled like plastic. The white cast eventually went away, but the smell didn't. It was like having a plastic mask on my face and having to smell it for a long time. Yuck. The white cast went away after about 15-20 minutes, but it was still kind of oily or greasy, and that didn't seem to go away. I wear glasses, so having my glasses sliding down my face all day was kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: The Morris's

customer_reviews.title: feels good
customer_reviews.text: I was not looking forward to "trying" to be faithful putting the sunscreen on. I do really like this stuff because it feels good and smells fine. After putting it on I still felt clean, not ready to attract dirt. It will not be a chore to put it on every day to protect my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Great product. May not be sensitive enough for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, wears well, and was water resistant as the ad boasts. My 2 yr old with sensitive skin had a reaction to this.... so, that is the reason I did not give it 5 Stars. My husband, 7 yr old and myself all wore this and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to spread it because it immediately starts spreading all over your skin. It has a definite white cast. I can’t believe that this protection from the sun would be very good since it moves all over the skin away from where you put it before you can even get it rubbed in. One of the worst sunscreens I’ve tried and I’ve tried a lot
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: No greasy like others.
customer_reviews.text: I hate suntan lotion- the greasy feeling drives me crazy. This is my favorite suntan lotion so far. It goes on smoothly and doesn't leave an oily residue. I will definitely purchase more of this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan N. Miles

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Meets all expectations, feels a little like sunscreen when you first put it on, but then it absorbs nicely. Really like the smell. It's not that strong sunscreen smell which you're used to with most brands.
customer_reviews.author: KP903

customer_reviews.title: Smell is an issue.
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen works very well and stays on well during a 60 mile bicycle ride. My reason for rating this sunscreen low was the chemical smell left on my skin. Two showers did not remove the scent. Also, the scent was still obvious the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rutan

customer_reviews.title: The sunblock that ends all sunblock
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunblock I have used (and I have used a lot of them). I have fair skin which burns easily but when I use this, no burn at all even when outside in the noon hours of summer. I use it every day in the summer with no skin irritation at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Turns white when I sweat
customer_reviews.text: I forked out way more than I normally would for this highly rated sunscreen. Unfortunately it turns white when I sweat. We're outside a lot in the summer and it's quite embarrassing to have milky lines running down my neck and chest. I ended up tossing the mostly full tube.
customer_reviews.author: alibel

customer_reviews.title: it literally melts into your skin
customer_reviews.text: i just used the anthelios sunscreen lotion and it really does immediately melts into your skin leaving my skin feeling light and smooth and non-greasy. it also made a great base for my liquid foundation. i will definitely by this again. so far the best moisturizing sunscreen i have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kono808

customer_reviews.title: Derm approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a dermatologist and we love this stuff. We have tried so many sunscreens out there and this is defiantly worth the money. We use this and Elta MD spray. Keep an eye on the expiration date. It doesn't work after it's expired. Sunburn kids weren't fun as a dermatologist family!
customer_reviews.author: RGar

customer_reviews.title: Effective lotion for sun allergy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen lotion I've used! It has helped significantly with avoiding sun rash/allergy. I typically use spray lotions and the bottles don't last long. This lotion tube lasts so much longer. After looking through lots of online reviews and purchasing it, I believe it's worth the cost and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best sunblock on the market
customer_reviews.text: My family and I discovered this sunscreen while visiting Barcelona 2 years ago. I couldn't find it in the US. Now it is available in several stores, but Amazon has the best prices. It is great. Works great and it light weight. I love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine_75

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price unless you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I don’t like the heavy feel of traditional sunscreens on my face, and I sometimes accidentally get some in my mouth when I apply over my lips- yuck. This sunscreen is lightweight and “milky” but doesn’t absorb any better than other less expensive sunscreens. I do notice it does not sting like others though, and didn’t notice a taste either. I haven’t compared sun protection with others yet so I’m not sure about performance. I will keep this and use it for face and body until it runs out but will not purchase again as it’s a bit more expensive than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: I have extremely sensitive skin and this product worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and this product worked great for me! It did not irritate my skin at all and it feels very smooth on your skin. You do have to follow the instructions and apply it 15 minutes before sun exposure and re-apply it every 2 hours. You may even need to re-apply it more frequently if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Genesse

customer_reviews.title: Amazon not authorized to sell this product
customer_reviews.text: Since my product had no expiration date, I followed up with the manufacturer to see if they could tell me. All they told me was Amazon was not authorized to sell this product and they couldn't tell me anything else. So, I hope what I bought is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Non oily long lasting sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I like how it really just melts into your skin and doesn’t leave my skin oily. The scent is non existent and if it can be used by my husband without any complaints of it being heavy or scented, it’s a win win for me. For the amount of sunblock you get it’s definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hong

customer_reviews.title: Smelly.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because of Consumer Reports but hated it—very, very strong and unpleasant odor and felt greasy to me. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lukadelic

customer_reviews.title: too greasy and stain all my items
customer_reviews.text: It is too greasy stay greasy after you apply and stain every thing my black bag has white stains all over , my car etc
customer_reviews.author: patricia murillo

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the rave reviews in an ad, this stains clothes, does not get absorbed into skin. Not what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: shelley stuart-bullock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this sun screen. It is not sticky, does not leave whitish residue on the skin and does not smell like sun screen at all; unlike the leading sun screen brands. If you are looking for an effective sun screen, this is the product to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kon Tiki67

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love their products. The sunscreen is light and has great protection. I use it for the beach and on the slopes. It is white but does not leave your skin white. It blends into skin easily and it’s a great moisturizer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, did not irritate skin
customer_reviews.text: Used this product during our latest venture to the beach. It did not leave a greasy residue, coverage lasted most of the day (reapplied after a spending a long time in the ocean), and no one had a sunburn that is attributable to the product. One child prone to small breakouts, and was not irritated by using this product. Would recommend, and plan to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Go to sunscreen now.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is fantastic and worth the money. If you are concerned with your face or any part of your body being burnt I highly recommend this product. Just make sure you rub in real well (as with all sunscreens)
customer_reviews.author: J K

product_meta.title: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Melt-In Sunscreen Milk Body & Face Sunscreen Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 60, Oxybenzone & Octinoxate Free, Oil-Free Sunscreen
product_meta.description:
Size:5 Fl Oz

Amazon is an authorized retailer of La Roche-Posay products. Anthelios 60 Body and Face Sunscreen SPF 60 Melt-In Sunscreen Milk with Antioxidants. This La Roche-Posay sunscreen’s features are: Formulated with exclusive Cell-OX Shield technology, UVA/UVB filters + Antioxidants, Broad Spectrum SPF 60 protection, Water Resistant (80 minutes), Velvety texture, easy to apply. Advanced broad spectrum sunscreen protection in a fast-absorbing, velvety texture. Tested on sensitive skin, Dermatologist tested, Oil-free, Allergy tested, Paraben-free, Fragrance-free, Non-Comedogenic A pioneer in UV protection research for over 15 years, La Roche-Posay, with Anthelios, is trusted by dermatologists worldwide for its advanced formulations in UV protection. Apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply sunscreen after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, at least every 2 hours. Children under 6 months of age: ask a doctor. ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AVOBENZONE 3%, HOMOSALATE 10%, OCTISALATE 5%, OCTOCRYLENE 7% INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, DIMETHICONE, POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, GLYCERIN, ALCOHOL DENAT., POLY C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, TRISILOXANE, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, DIETHYLHEXYL SYRINGYLIDENEMALONATE, PEG-100 STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PEG-8 LAURATE, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIETHANOLAMINE, TOCOPHEROL, INULIN LAURYL CARBAMATE, DISODIUM EDTA, P-ANISIC ACID, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, XANTHAN GUM, CASSIA ALATA LEAF EXTRACT, MALTODEXTRIN, SODIUM DODECYLBENZENESULFONATE. If wearing with makeup, apply sunscreen first, followed by makeup. Product packaging may vary.



BRAND STORY
Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
